title: Sounds 2.0.1 unable to save sound selection
content:
When trying to select a new ringtone, i'm unable to save when selecting some of the ringtones included in the app (e.g. reality bites/cats meow.  I like to freak out my colleagues).

Tried clearing cache, clearing storage, tried in safe mode.

Also tried uninstalling/re-installing app. Have done 2x factory resets.

Currently running Android Q beta 2.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
